attributes.action: Referendum on the UK leaving the ECHR
attributes.additional_details:
1. Sovereignty and Parliamentary Supremacy
	•	The ECHR allows an external court in Strasbourg to override or influence UK court decisions.
	•	Leaving would mean final authority rests with UK courts and Parliament, without having to follow foreign judgments.
	•	Advocates argue this restores the principle that laws are made and interpreted entirely in the UK.
attributes.background: It is old, outdated and abused

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729212
